description:
This precision tool sharpens and bevels side and base edges and trims excess side wall. Works on all metal-edged skis and snowboards.

  • Made of durable and impact resistant lexan polycarbonate
  • Includes high quality file and detailed instructions
  • Ceramic rollers minimize friction and allow filings to fall away from base
  • Clamps file or stone with a simple turn of the knob
  • Simple and accurate bevel angle adjustment from 0 to 6-degrees pulling and turning knob
  • Holds any length file or stone
name: Tools4Boards Xact 3 in 1 Edge Tool
